channel.title: Posts on Chun Wu
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chun Wu

item.title: Who the heck are YOU?
item.description: It will please some of you to know that I almost titled this post “I am Chun.” But friends in my life consistently knock me down a few pegs as a gentle reminder to be humble - which I am and prefer to be. You know who you are. As an individual I seek to better myself and further my knowledge in all areas of life but my passion remains constant.
